## Purpose

Use this skill for iOS-specific guidance (Swift snapshot workflows, record/verify behavior, macOS CI constraints).

## When to use

- iOS UI changed (SwiftUI/UIKit/view rendering).
- `$visual-regression-testing` indicates platform `ios`.

## How to use

1) Open `references/visual-regression-ios.md`.
2) Map repository commands to iOS verify/record targets.
3) Apply macOS/Xcode runner guidance and report outcomes.
